Utilities
[FCLib API]

Collaboration diagram for Utilities:

Detailed Description

Support routines.

Description:

This module containes various utilities for general computing purposes. So far these include a few functions to process path strings to get base file names, extension, etc. (see below) and also macros and routines for scientifically dealing with floating point numbers (see Floating Point Comparisons).


Modules

 Floating Point Comparisons
 Some useful constants and floats comparisons routines.
 File Path Processing
 Various routines for decomposing file paths.
 Misc Utilities
